description:
Crispin is a mountain guardian patrolling the mountains the area that Jibacoil and Metagross reside in. He met up with Ash and his friends as well as Officer Jenny and explained to them that the area that the Pok√©mon battle in is filled with water.
He explained that everywhere in the mountains, there is magnetism and sometimes, the mountains send out strange magnetic forces. Jibacoil and Metagross would battle in the mountain cavity to get rid of that magnetism that collected on their bodies.
name: Katsuzoo
